title: Suspicious Bank Statement - Possible Forgery
description: I received this bank statement from a tenant applicant, but the fonts look inconsistent and the totals do not match. Requesting forensic analysis.

title: Urgent: Phishing Link in Corporate Email
description: Received an email claiming to be from HR asking to reset password. The URL looks like 'h-r-portal-update.com'.
remarks: AI Analysis confirmed malicious domain signature. Blacklisted immediately.

title: Vendor Agreement Verification
description: We are about to sign this contract. Can you verify the digital signature integrity and ensure no hidden metadata alterations?
remarks: Document hash matches the blockchain record. No alterations detected.

title: UPI Payment Fraud - 5000 INR Deducted
description: I scanned a QR code to receive money but money was deducted instead. The transaction ID is provided below.
